thread.title: Suspended Platini loses England's support in FIFA campaign
thread.title_full: Suspended Platini loses England's support in FIFA campaign

author: ROB HARRIS AP Sports Writer
title: Suspended Platini loses England's support in FIFA campaign
text:
Close Sang Tan 
FILE - In this May 24, 2013 file photo UEFA President Michel Platini reacts as he speaks to members of the media at the end of the 37th Ordinary UEFA Congress in London. UEFA leaders were meeting Thursday Oct. 15, 2015 to decide whether to continue backing Michel Platini, with some not yet satisfied by his explanation for a payment that led to his 90-day FIFA suspension. (AP Photo/Sang Tan) AP Suspended Platini loses England's support in FIFA campaign Suspended Platini loses England's support in FIFA campaign By ROB HARRIS AP Sports Writer Updated
